channel.title: Comments on: Moving To A New Host
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Maybe they'll be back, if only because I got used to seeing them up there.
And.... there aren't any popups here!
item.content:encoded:
Maybe they’ll be back, if only because I got used to seeing them up there.

And…. there aren’t any popups here!

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
I liked the old ads better, these popups are quite annoying.
If you'll put back to the google ads I promise to click.
item.content:encoded:
I liked the old ads better, these popups are quite annoying.

If you’ll put back to the google ads I promise to click.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
xtreeq: :) Yes, out of my 5 readers, you're the only one who clicked the ads, I believe.
Thanks. I have big plans for the 20$ you earned me.
item.content:encoded:
xtreeq:
:) Yes, out of my 5 readers, you’re the only one who clicked the ads, I believe.

Thanks. I have big plans for the 20$ you earned me.

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: I realy liked those google adds :( Push the google.
item.content:encoded:
I realy liked those google adds :(
Push the google.

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description:
As your num' 1 reader and fan I was deeply saddened, disappointed and hurt by this move and decided to quit reading blogs altogether.
Maybe I'll start climbing mountains instead... yes!! that's a great idea... Carmel mountain here I come... just need a little rest before I start, maybe read some blogs while I rest...
item.content:encoded:
As your num’ 1 reader and fan I was deeply saddened, disappointed and hurt by this move and decided to quit reading blogs altogether.

Maybe I’ll start climbing mountains instead… yes!! that’s a great idea… Carmel mountain here I come… just need a little rest before I start, maybe read some blogs while I rest…

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:) Actually, a major reason I didn't move last year was because I planned on moving to a new apartment as well and didn't want the headache of transferring the website to a new host.
But it only took a few hours on Saturday, including reading reviews on different hosts, setting up the new account, transferring the database and everything. I'm surprised it went fairly easy. I expected it to fail miserably.
item.content:encoded:
:) Actually, a major reason I didn’t move last year was because I planned on moving to a new apartment as well and didn’t want the headache of transferring the website to a new host.

But it only took a few hours on Saturday, including reading reviews on different hosts, setting up the new account, transferring the database and everything. I’m surprised it went fairly easy. I expected it to fail miserably.

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Is it a part of your general moving plan?
item.content:encoded: Is it a part of your general moving plan?
